SEARCH
Package me.bristermitten.mittenlib.gui.manager

Interface GUIManager<Ctx extends CommandContext>

All Known Implementing Classes:
SpigotGUIManager
public interface GUIManager<Ctx extends CommandContext>
Manages GUI sessions and their lifecycles. Provides a centralised way to create, manage, and clean up GUI instances.

  • Method Summary

    startSession(GUIBase<Model,Msg,V,Ctx,Cmd> gui, Viewer viewer)
    Creates and starts a new GUI session for the given viewer.

  • Method Details

    • startSession

      <Model, Msg, V extends View<Msg, V, Viewer>, Cmd extends Command<Ctx, Msg>, Viewer extends InventoryViewer<Msg, V>> SessionID<Model,Msg,V,Viewer> startSession(GUIBase<Model,Msg,V,Ctx,Cmd> gui, Viewer viewer)
      Creates and starts a new GUI session for the given viewer.
      Type Parameters:
      Model - the model type
      Msg - the message type
      V - the view type
      Viewer - the viewer type
      Parameters:
      gui - the GUI implementation to run
      viewer - the viewer (e.g., player) who will interact with the GUI
      Returns:
      a unique session ID for this GUI instance

    • sendMessage

      <Model, Msg, V extends View<Msg, V, Viewer>, Cmd extends Command<Ctx, Msg>, Viewer extends InventoryViewer<Msg, V>> boolean sendMessage(SessionID<Model,Msg,V,Viewer> sessionId, Msg command)
      Sends a command to an active GUI session.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - the session ID
      command - the command to send
      Returns:
      true if the command was sent successfully, false if the session doesn't exist

    • closeSession

      <Model, Msg, V extends View<Msg, V, Viewer>, Cmd extends Command<Ctx, Msg>, Viewer extends InventoryViewer<Msg, V>> boolean closeSession(SessionID<Model,Msg,V,Viewer> sessionId)
      Closes a GUI session and cleans up resources.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - the session ID to close
      Returns:
      true if the session was closed, false if it didn't exist

    • getSession

      <Model, Msg, V extends View<Msg, V, Viewer>, Viewer extends InventoryViewer<Msg, V>> Optional<GUISession<Model,Msg,V,Viewer,Ctx>> getSession(SessionID<Model,Msg,V,Viewer> sessionId)
      Gets an active GUI session by ID.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - the session ID
      Returns:
      the session if it exists and is active

    • getSessionByViewer

      <Msg, V extends View<Msg, V, Viewer>, Viewer extends InventoryViewer<Msg, V>> Optional<GUISession<?,?,?,?,Ctx>> getSessionByViewer(Viewer viewer)
      Finds a GUI session by viewer.
      Parameters:
      viewer - the viewer to search for
      Returns:
      the session if found

    • shutdown

      void shutdown()
      Closes all active sessions and shuts down the manager.
